0.sentence: hello can I speak to the customer support department

1.sentence: yes this is customer support how can I help you

2.sentence: I got the portable audio player I ordered from you but it's not working

3.sentence: %HESITATION I'm sorry to hear that can you tell me your order number

4.sentence: I have a right here yes it's a five six seven eight

5.sentence: okay the product you have is the portable media player can you tell me what's the problem

6.sentence: well I can get it to the TV but it's not turning on

7.sentence: how did you connected to the TV

9.sentence: well the USPS for PC connections only on this model you can't connect to the TV what

10.sentence: what what do I do then how can I use it if I can't connected to the TV this is crazy

11.sentence: please don't worry Sir you can connected to the TV using an HDMI cable

12.sentence: HDMI cable %HESITATION there is no HDMI cable in the box

13.sentence: yes it's not included you'll have to get one

14.sentence: why haven't you guys included the HDMI cable what do you expect for me to get one right now

15.sentence: I'm sorry Sir but this device has four different kinds of courts in it we didn't include any cables for any of those so that we could offer you the best price on the device instead of charging you for stuff that you won't need

16.sentence: okay that's a heck of a lot of trouble for me to go downtown to get a silly HDMI cable

17.sentence: if you want you can order one from us will ship within twenty four hours

18.sentence: not I don't need it from you guys thanks anyway

19.sentence: sorry to hear that Sir I'll discuss your feedback with my seniors

20.sentence: yeah yeah all right by now
